column4: hi, my Ubuntu server was hacked through one of those PHP shell scripts. How can I find what was done there? Can I look at www-data's user logs? How? How do I know if we're hosting something evil?
well you need to wipe the drive and reinstall imo...
I was hoping for a less drastic measure :(
well if someone mailicious had control of your system that's the only sensible measure you can take
